biography: â€‹Son of Broadway veteran Michel Bell. Is an honors graduate of San Jose State University, California. Currently lives in New York City. [2000] Enjoys playing basketball and tennis. Sings and plays keyboard in a band.  Twin girls, Serrae and Jaena, born Saturday 21st June 2003.  Wife, Aviss, gave birth to their second set of twins, a boy and a girl, on December 2, 2008. Daughter, Quinn, weighed 5 lbs. 12 oz. and son, Eli, weighed 6 lbs. 13 oz.
name: Coby Bell
